articles.content:
DPRK-Japan talks to be held 
    Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Talks between the governments of the DPRK and Japan will be held in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, on October 29 and 30 according to the spirit and main principle of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang declaration.
 A series of issues related to the normalization of the DPRK-Japan relations will be discussed at the talks.
